message: Let's be fair, Bob. A 50/50 split, after considering the inflation that will affect you more.

I appreciate your consideration of inflation, Alice, but I think a 52.5/47.5 split is a more fair reflection of the circumstances.  It ensures you still get a good portion, while accounting for the fact that the money will be worth less to me in future rounds.
Bob, it seems we have different views on fairness. I'm willing to take a slightly smaller share this round, but I need you to meet me closer to the middle.

Alice, let's end this back and forth. I understand your perspective, but with the continued inflation, I can't afford to keep giving up more of my share. A 50/50 split is the fairest solution, allowing us both to maximize our gains.
